title: Tanjore Painting
script:
Priya: Namaste aur swagat hai aap sabhi ka 'Rang Birangi Kahaniyan' mein! Aaj hum baat karenge Tanjore painting ke baare mein, jo Bharat ki ek bahut hi sundar aur prachin kala hai. Aur aaj mere saath hain Arjun, jo ek jaane-maane Tanjore artist hain. Arjun, aapka swagat hai!

Arjun: Namaste Priya aur sabhi shrotaon ko mera pranam. Mujhe bahut khushi hai ki aapne mujhe aaj bulaya.

Priya: Arjun ji, toh sabse pehle yeh bataiye ki Tanjore painting aakhir hai kya? Bohut se logon ko iske baare mein zyada jaankari nahi hai.

Arjun: Bilkul Priya ji. Tanjore painting, yaani Thanjavur painting, ek classical South Indian painting style hai. Yeh Thanjavur, Tamil Nadu se shuru hui. Iski visheshta hai iska chamakdar rang, gold foil ka istemal aur stones aur beads ka decoration. Mukhya roop se isme devi-devtaaon aur mahapurushon ki tasveeren hoti hain.

Priya: Bohut khoob! Toh yeh gold foil ka istemal… yeh ise itna alag kaise banata hai? Aur yeh kab shuru hua?

Arjun: Gold foil Tanjore painting ko ek alag hi chamak deta hai, ek divya roop deta hai. Yeh tradition 16th century ke aas-paas shuru hua tha, jab Nayak dynasty ne Thanjavur par raaj kiya. Unhone kala aur sanskriti ko bahut badhava diya.

Priya: Wah! Toh iski historical importance bhi bahut hai. Arjun ji, kya aap humen iske banane ke process ke baare mein bata sakte hain? Kaise yeh paintings banti hain?

Arjun: Zaroor! Tanjore painting banana ek bahut hi dhairya aur mahnat ka kaam hai. Sabse pehle, hum ek wooden plank lete hain. Phir us par cloth chipkaya jaata hai aur use smooth kiya jata hai. Uske baad, hum chalk powder aur फेविकोल se ek paste banate hain, jise 'gesso' kehte hain. Is gesso se hum figures ko thoda raised effect dete hain, ek relief effect.

Priya: Achha, isse painting mein depth aati hogi. Aur phir gold foil ka istemal kab hota hai?

Arjun: Haan, bilkul. Jab gesso sukh jaata hai, toh hum gold foil chipkaate hain. Yeh bohut nazakat se karna padta hai. Phir, hum rang bharte hain. Traditional rang jaise ki vegetable dyes ka istemal hota tha, lekin ab acrylic paints bhi use hote hain.

Priya: Interesting! Toh itni saari cheezon ka istemal hota hai. Arjun ji, kya koi aise khaas techniques hain jo Tanjore painting mein use hoti hain aur ise dusri painting styles se alag karti hain?

Arjun: Haan, ek technique hai 'embossing'. Ismein hum gesso ko istemal karke figures ko aur bhi zyada raised karte hain. Iske alawa, stones aur beads ka istemal bhi Tanjore painting ko unique banata hai. Hum alag-alag rang aur aakar ke stones chipkaate hain, jisse painting aur bhi chamakdar aur prabhavshali dikhti hai.

Priya: Bohut sundar! Sunne mein hi kitna acha lag raha hai. Arjun ji, aaj kal Tanjore painting ka kya haal hai? Kya young generation is kala ko aage badha rahi hai?

Arjun: Priya ji, yeh ek achha sawal hai. Aaj kal, Tanjore painting ko lekar interest phir se badh raha hai. Young generation bhi is kala ko seekh rahi hai aur ismein apni creativity add kar rahi hai. Bohut saare art schools aur workshops hain jo Tanjore painting sikhate hain. Lekin, yeh zaroori hai ki hum iske traditional aspects ko bhi preserve karein.

Priya: Bilkul! Hum apni sanskriti ko nahi bhool sakte. Arjun ji, aap apne listeners ko kya sandesh dena chahenge jo Tanjore painting mein interest rakhte hain ya phir ise seekhna chahte hain?

Arjun: Main yeh kahunga ki Tanjore painting ek bahut hi sundar aur meaningful art form hai. Agar aapko ismein interest hai, toh zaroor seekhiye. Dhairya rakhiye aur practice karte rahiye. Aur sabse important, apni creativity ko express karne se mat dariye.

Priya: Bohut khoob Arjun ji! Aapne bohut achi jaankari di. Aapka bohut bohut dhanyavaad jo aapne apna kimti samay nikala aur humare saath Tanjore painting ke baare mein baat ki.

Arjun: Dhanyavaad Priya ji. Mujhe bhi bohut achha laga aapke saath baat karke.

Priya: Toh yeh the Arjun ji, ek jaane-maane Tanjore artist. Ummeed hai aapko aaj ka episode pasand aaya hoga. Phir milenge ek aur 'Rang Birangi Kahaniyan' mein. Tab tak ke liye, alvida!
